DOC.brief_summary: 5D and 2D ultrasounds will be done for pregnant women with macrosomic fetuses to determine estimated fetal weight using hadlock formula. The accuracy of fetal weight obtained by ultrasound will be compared to actual birth weight.
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy of 5D LB Ultrasound in Prediction of Birth Weight in Macrosomic Babies : A Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: 37 to 42 weeks gestation macrosomic fetuses maternal diabetes intrauterine fetal death multiple pregnancy congenital anomaly nonvisualized fetal parts
